skills.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
skills.description: Attacks an enemy 3 times with a shimmering light. Each strike has a 15% chance to inflict Continuous Damage for 3 turns.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Enchant
skills.description: Puts the enemy to sleep for 2 turns. You will gain an additional turn if the target is put asleep.

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage

skills.name: Phantom Light
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 5 times with a ball of light, recovers 50% of the damage dealt. Each attack has a 50% chance to leave a Branding Effect for 2 turns and the skill will deal 25% increased damage to enemies under Branding Effect.

skill_effect.name: Brand
skill_effect.description: Enemies with Branding Effect take 25% more Damage

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill
